question:
Arrange the following ports of Odisha from north to south
1. Dhamra Port
2. Kasia Port
3. Paradip Port
4. Gopalpur Port
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: From North to South- Kasia port (Bhadrak district), Dhamra port (Bhadrak district), Paradip port (Jagatsinghpur district), Gopalpur port (Ganjam district)
